_header: The Jews woned in sere country
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 5346.
_description: Gospel, ‘Domnica infra Octavas Epiphanie’, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
The Iewis woned in sere contreAnd a contre hight
                    Galilee…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…ffor bi him takenynge may we takeYlle feleschipe to
                    forsake
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
ÞE Iewes woned in heore CuntreAnd in a Cuntre þat hihte
                    Galilee…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffor bi him may we ensaumple takeVuel cumpaynye to
                    forsake
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Cum factus esset Ihesu cristi ascendentibus (f.
                    175rc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Þe iewes woned in sere contreAnd o contre hight
                    Galile…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…By him may we ensaumple takeEuele felawschipe to
                    forsake
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica prima post octavan Epiphanie secundum Lucam (p.
                    54)

CULDd11.First Lines:
IEwis wonid in sere cuntreWhich was clepid
                    Calile…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…þat may amende him of his sake& chastise him if he
                    mystake…
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Cum factus esset ihesus annorum duodecim ascendentibus parentibus
                        ierusalem et cetera (f. 63v)

CULGg531.First Lines:
þe iewes dwelled in sere contreAnd in one þat hyght
                    galile…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…ffor by hym may we toknyng takeYll felowschep to for
                    sake
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
Dominica prima post epiphania secundum lucam (f.
                    34v)

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
The iwes weyndid in sere cuntreAnd a cuntre hight
                    galilee…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…ffor by hym may we ensample takeIll felyschip forto
                    forsake

EDCPCM.First Lines:
þe iowes woned in ser cuntreAnd a cuntre hit
                    galile…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…For bi him we mai bisen bitakIlle felawschip forto
                    forsak
EDCPCM.Attributed Title:
Dominica infra octavam epiphanie secundum lucam (f.
                    28rb)
EDCPCM.Editions:
Small,  John,
                        ed.  
             English Metrical Homilies….
         Edinburgh: W. Paterson, 1862: 107-18.
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Þe Iwes woned in sere contre& in a contre þat hyght
                    galalie…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…for by hym ensampyll may we take& yll felichype here for
                    to for sake
MinULZ822.Attributed Title: Dominica infra octavas Epiphanie Secundum Lucam (f. 6)

HunHM129.First Lines:
Þe iowys wonyd in sere contreAnd a contre heght
                    galyle…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…ffor by hym may we ensapyll takIll felawschyp for to
                    forsak
